articles.description: Pakistan's World Cup-winning pacer made a rather blunt remark on the Indian side as he countered Harbhajan Singh's statement on the 2007 T20 World Cup. | Cricket
articles.content: With India and Pakistan no longer playing bilateral series for over a decade now, references of past matches go back to their meetings in ICC and Asia Cup games. For the build-up to the blockbuster 2… [+2698 chars]
